Tour du Rwanda Rubavu - Karongi

Etape: Rubavu - Karongi:
Km: 102.6
Isaha yo guhaguruka: 10:00
Umubare w'abakinnyi: 76

Umwanditsi : Ngabo Roben na Ishimwe Israel

Amafoto : Niyonzima Moïse

Uko isiganwa riri kugenda

14:18

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

DUSHIMIYE ABO TWABANYE

Abadukurikiye umunota ku wundi turabashimiye cyane. Tuzasubira mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 28 Gashyantare 2019, tubagezaho agace ka Gatanu kazahaguruka i Karongi gasorezwe i Musanze ku ntera ya 138.7Km.

Ibihembo byatanzwe

Umwenda w'urusha abandi Sprint utangwa na SP: Du Plooy Rohan (Pro-Touch)

Umwenda w'umukinnyi ukiri muto witwaye neza utangwa na Prime Insurance Ltd: Debesay Yakob (Érythrée)

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Kudus wambaye umwenda w'umuhondo yahageze nyuma y'iminota itandatu

Umunya-Érythrée Merhawi Kudus ntabwo yahiriwe n'uyu munsi kuko yasoreje ku mwanya wa 24 akoresheje amasaha 02h45'15''. Yasizwe na Avila watsinze iminota 6'45''. Gusa gutsinda iyi ntera nta kinini byafashije Edwin Alcibiades Ávila Vanegas uri ku mwanya wa 29 arushwa na Merhawi Kudus iminota 16'38''

12:55

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Edwin Alcibiades Ávila Vanegas ni muntu ki?

Uyu mugabo bakunda kwita Calimenio yavuyekiye muri Colombia tariki 21 Ugushyingo 1989. Ni igihangange kuko yahagarariye igihugu cye mu mikino Olempike kuva mu 2012. Yashoboye kwegukana shampiyona ya Colombia 2016 atsinze ibihangange muri uyu mukino ku rwego rw'isi nka Nairo Alexander Quintana Rojas.

12:47

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Mugisha Samuel niwe munyarwanda uje hafi

Uwegukanye Tour du Rwanda umwaka ushize Mugisha Samuel asoreje ku mwanya wa kane, inyuma ya Edwin Alcibiades Ávila Vanegas na Pablo Torres Muiño ukinira Interpro Cycling Academy yo mu Buyapani

12:45

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

AGACE KA KANE KEGUKANYWE NA Edwin Alcibiades Ávila Vanegas

Umunya-Colombia Edwin Alcibiades Ávila Vanegas ukinira Israel Cycling Academy yo muri Israel asesekaye i Karongi ari imbere.

12:42

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Mu bilometero bibiri bya nyuma Ávila Edwin acomotse mu bari imbere

Imbaraga ni nyinshi ku basatira umurongo usorezwaho Ávila Edwin ukinira Israel Cycling Academy agerageje gusiga abo bari kumwe imbere ariko Mugisha Samuel ahise akoresha imbaraga aramufata

12:39

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Amayeri menshi mu bari imbere binjiye mu bilometero bitanu bya nyuma

Abakinnyi batatu bari imbere bari bakomeje kugeragezanya imbaraga. Buri umwe ari kujya imbere akagerageza gukoresha imbaraga ngo arebe ko yarusha imbaraba bagenzi be agatsinda aka gace ariko baracyari kumwe. Barabura ibilometero bitanu gusa ngo basoze

12:35

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Rubengera- Batatu bari imbere barimo Mugisha Samuel barasatira intsinzi

Abasiganwa batatu bari imbere barimo PabloTorres, Umunyarwanda Mugisha Samuel, na Edwin Avilla basigaje ibilometero 10 gusa ngo bagere ku murongo. Barasiga igikundi kirimo Kudus wambaye umwenda w'umuhondo iminota 5'20

12:23

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Bruno Araujo basize muri Mushubati

Mu gihe abari imbere bari binjiye muri Karongi, Bruno Araujo wa BAI - Sicasal - Petro de Luanda wari mu b'imbere arananiwe arasigara

12:12

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Rwanda Tea, icyayi kizimanirwa abakinnyi muri Tour du Rwanda 2019

Rwanda Tea ni umufatanyabikorwa wa Tour Du Rwanda 2019. Yanateye inkunga Tour du Rwanda ebyiri ziheruka binyuze muri “Rwanda Tea - A Natural Reawakening”. Icyayi cy'u Rwanda ni ryo zimano rya mu gitondo ku bakinnyi mbere yo gutangira urugendo rurerure rw’imisozi n’amataba banyonga igare.

Ikigo cy'Igihugu gishinzwe kohereza mu mahanga Ibikomoka ku Buhinzi n'Ubworozi mu Rwanda (NAEB) kibinyujije muri Rwanda Tea cyahisemo gutera inkunga iri siganwa kubera agaciro giha imikino by’umwihariko amagare. Ni cyo gihemba umukinnyi wagaragaje guhatana kurusha abandi muri buri gace.

Muri iri siganwa, abakinnyi bazanyura mu misozi ihinzeho icyayi n’ahari inganda zacyo mu Ngororero (Rubaya tea estate), Rubavu (Pfunda) na Nyabihu tea factory mu Karere ka Nyabihu.

12:10

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Hasigaye ibilometero 32 ngo tugere i Karongi


Mu gihe hasigaye ibilometero 32 ngo umukinnyi wa mbere asesekare mu Mujyi wa Karongi, abakinnyi bane bari imbere basize igikundi kirimo Merhawi Kudus ufite umwenda w’umuhondo ho 3’35”.

Abakinnyi bayoboye barimo PabloTorres, Umunyarwanda Mugisha Samuel, Araujo Bruno na Edwin Avilla

12:09

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Imisozi ntabwo yoroheye abasiganwa

12:08

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Igikundi gikomeje gusigara

Abakinnyi bane bari imbere bakomeje gusiga Merhawi Kudus wambaye umwenda w’umuhondo, iminota 3’35”. Gusa igihe cyo gukuka umutima kuri we ntikiragera kuko umukinnyi uri hafi mu bari imbere, PabloTorres, isiganwa muri iyi etape ryatangiye Kudus amurusha iminota 16’45”.

12:05

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

AMAFOTO y'agace ka kane agaragaza ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda mu misozi ya Rutsiro

11:33

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Kudus wambaye umwenda w'umuhondo yasizwe iminota itatu n'abari imbere

Abakinnyi 16 barimo Debesay Mekseb wa Érythrée, Azzedine Lagab wo muri Algerie, Samuel Mugisha, Pablo Torres, Rugg Timothy na Didier Munyaneza basohotse muri Gishwati bari imbere. Basize igikundi kirimo Merhawi Kudus iminota itatu n'amasegonda ane.

11:02

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Hailemichael Mulu yegukanye amanota yo mu musozi wa

Mu musozi wa Kamiko, Hailemichael Mulu ukinira Dimension Data ahageze ari imbere akurikiwe na PabloTorres na Andemeskel Awet. Basize igikundi iminota 2'24

10:50

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Mugisha Samuel wihaye intego yo gutsinda agace kamwe aracomotse

Habayemo ugucomoka inshuro nyinshi ariko igikundi kigafata abari imbere byihuse. Abasiganwa bageze muri Pfunda, imbere hari abakinnyi barindwi barimo Mugisha Samuel basize igikundi amasegonda 17.

Mbere yo guhaguruka Mugisha yabwiye IGIHE ati ''Intego yanjye ubu ni ugushaka uko natsinda agace kuko umwenda w'umuhondo byararangiye. Gusa turi gukina neza nubwo tutarabona intsinzi abanyarwanda bifuza.''

10:20

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Abakinnyi 11 bagiye guhanganira amanota yo mu musozi wa mbere w'aka gace

Pablo Torres Muiño ukinira Interpro Cycling Academy, na Alessandro Fedeli wa Delko Marseille bari mu itsinda ry'abakinnyi 11 bagiye gushaka amanota yo mu musozi wa mbere. Ni umusozi usohoka mu Mujyi wa Rubavu

10:11

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Gucomoka kwa mbere

David Lozano ukinira Team Novo Nordisk, Daniel Turek ukomoka muri République Tchèque bacomotse, basize igikundi amasegonda 27 gusa baracyari mu kilometero cya mbere

10:06

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Abasiganwa barahagurutse

Kudus mu mwenda w'umuhondo n'abandi basiganwa 75 bahagurutse mu Mujyi wa Rubavu, batangiye agace ka kane ka Tour du Rwanda 2019

09:44

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Imyiteguro ya nyuma y'abakinnyi mbere yo guhaguruka

Mu gihe habura iminota mike ngo Agace ka Kane ka Tour du Rwanda 2019 gatangire gukinwa, abasiganwa bageze aho bagiye guhagurukira. Bari kwishyushya ari nako buri kipe ihamagarwa harebwa abakinnyi bagiye gutangira isiganwa.

09:14

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Icyizere cyo kwegukana isiganwa cyarayoyotse ariko hari izindi ntego


Kapiteni wa Team Rwanda, Ndayisenga Valens, umunyarwanda rukumbi washoboye gutsindira i Karongi mu mateka, yabwiye IGIHE ko abanyarwanda bafite intego yo gushaka ibindi bihembo bitari umwenda w’umuhondo.

Ati “Sinavuga ko tugifite icyizere ku mwenda w’umuhondo ariko gutsinda agace birashoboka. Tugiye kurwana no kwegukana ibindi bihembo bitangwa kuko nabyo bizana ishema ku gihugu cyacu. Sinavuga ko tudahagaze neza, ahubwo turi guhangana n’amakipe akomeye, abanyarwanda bakwiye kubyumva.”

09:14

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Icyo amateka avuga ku duce dusorezwa i Karongi


Umwaka ushize agace kasorejwe i Karongi kegukanywe na Rugg Timothy wakiniraga Embrace The World Cycling Team yo muri Canada none uyu mwaka yagarutse ari muri BAI - Sicasal - Petro de Luanda yo muri Angola.

Mu nshuro enye Tour du Rwanda imaze gusorezwa i Karongi, umunyarwanda umwe, Valens Ndayisenga niwe washoboye kwegukana agace, ni mu 2016 ubwo yegukanaga Tour du Rwanda ye ya kabiri.

09:13

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Inzira banyuramo

Baratangirira i Rubavu bazamuke ku Nyundo bafate Pfunda bahite binjira mu muhanda mushya umanuka kuri Nyamyumba ukinjira muri Rutsiro.

Urugendo rurerure bararukora bamanuka inzira yose y’Akarere ka Rutsiro bahereye mu gace ka Bitare, bagakomeza hepfo ku musozi wa Nyagahinika baherwaho amanota y’ahazamuka.

Barakomeza bamanuke bace i Murunda na Gasiza bagere mu gace kitwa Congo-Nil binjire muri Mushubati basohoke aka karere ka Rutsiro bahita bahinguka i Rubengera muri Karongi, basoreze imbere y’ishami rya Cogebanque ryo muri aka karere.

09:12

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Imiterere y’agace ka Kane

Abasiganwa 76 bagiye guhaguruka i Rubavu hafi y’inyubako y’isoko batarimo Arthuce Jodele Tella ukinira Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Cameroun wasezerewe ku munsi w’ejo nyuma yo kugera aho basoreza nyuma y’igihe kirenga isaha Kudus wa mbere ahageze.

Ni agace gatangira saa 10:00 gafite intera ya kilometero 102.6 zirimo imisozi ine itangirwaho amanota y’ahazamuka. Iyo ni uwa Rubavu, Kamiko, Nyagahanika na Rubengera mbere yo kwinjira muri Karongi.

Abakinnyi bahabwa amahirwe yo gutsinda aka gace ni abahanga mu kumanuka kuko bitera ubwoba benshi kandi uyu muhanda urimo amakorosi adasanzwe.

09:10

Kuwa gatatu, 27.02.2019

Tubahaye ikaze mu gace ka Tour du Rwanda kagutembereza ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda

Mwaramukanye amahoro!

Kimwe mu biryoshya isiganwa ngarukamwaka ry’umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare rizenguruka u Rwanda, Tour du Rwanda harimo no kwirebera ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda, nk’imisozi, ibibaya, imirima y’icyayi, ibiyaga n’ibindi.


Agace ka Kane k’iri siganwa riri kuba ku nshuro ya 11 kanogeye ijisho kuko kagiye guhaguruka i Rubavu mu nkengero z’Ikiyaga cya Kivu, gasorezwe i Karongi ku mazi nyuma yo kunyura mu misozi myiza ya Rutsiro muri Gishwati no mu mirima y’icyayi ya Pfunda.
